summary: Sentry event hook integration completed. User configured the integration in Sentry dashboard with webhook URL, permissions, and issue events. Integration is now active and ready to receive errors from Sentry. Backend webhook receiver endpoint is ready to process incoming errors and store them in database for agent access.
current_status: Automated error reporting system is fully operational: Sentry event hook configured, backend webhook receiver ready, database table created, agent query endpoints available, and cursor rules updated. Errors will now automatically flow from Sentry to backend to agent for automatic fixing.
